sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"机会"之意。
means: chance ： 侧重指偶然或意外的机会，有时也指正常或好的机会。
opportunity ： 侧重指有利或适合于采取行动，以达到某一目的或实现某种愿望的最佳时机或机会。
occasion ： 指特殊时机或良机，也指时节。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"某种性质,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurd荒谬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.荒谬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权威,威信,权威人士,权力
stems_affixes.word_buile: author创造者+ity某种性质,状态等→n.权威,威信,权威人士,权力
electric电的+ity某种性质,状态等→电,电流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal相等的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
stems_affixes.word_buile: familiar熟悉的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
frugal节约的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.节约,节俭
genial亲切的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.和蔼,温和
infirm弱的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚弱
mendac说谎+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚假
opportune凑巧的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.机会,时机
prob测试,证明+ity某种性质,状态等→[人]经得起证明和试验
rigid刚硬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.固执,坚定,僵化
san健康的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.神志清楚
simpl=simple简单的+ic+ity某种性质,状态等→n.简单,简易,朴素,直率
venal贪财的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.唯利是图

means.word_mean: 适当的时机；有利的场合
就业(或晋升、进步等)的良机</seg>

entry.def: An opportunity is a situation in which it is possible for you to do something that you want to do.

example.ex: I had an opportunity to go to New York and study...
example.tran: 我曾经有一个去纽约学习的机会。

example.ex: The best reason for a trip to London is the super opportunity for shopping...
example.tran: 绝佳的购物机会是前往伦敦的最好理由。

means.word_mean: 1. a possibility due to a favorable combination of circumstances;

sentences.sentence: "the holiday gave us the opportunity to visit Washington"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French opportunite, from Latin opportunitas, from opportunus (see opportune)

sentences.cn: 你们最后将有机会提问任何问题。
sentences.en: You'll have the opportunity to ask any questions at the end.

sentences.cn: 没有机会进行深入讨论了。
sentences.en: There was no opportunity for further discussion.

sentences.cn: 至少要给他机会解释一下发生了什么事。
sentences.en: At least give him the opportunity of explaining what happened.

sentences.cn: 本公司提倡男女机会均等。
sentences.en: Our company promotes equal opportunities for women (= women are given the same jobs, pay, etc. as men) .

sentences.cn: 职业发展 / 就业 / 工作机会
sentences.en: career/employment/job opportunities

sentences.cn: 我谨借此机会感谢同事的支持。
sentences.en: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank my colleagues for their support.

sentences.cn: 他动不动就对我粗鲁无礼。
sentences.en: He is rude to me at every opportunity (= whenever possible) .

sentences.cn: 他们打算尽早关闭学校。
sentences.en: They intend to close the school at the earliest opportunity (= as soon as possible) .

sentences.cn: 行事的良机
sentences.en: a window of opportunity (= a period of time when the circumstances are right for doing sth)

sentences.en: The quiz was a good opportunity for the exhibition of his knowledge.

sentences.cn: 顺致最崇高的敬意.

sentences.cn: 坐失这个良机, 那是太傻了,这是一生中难得的机会.
sentences.en: It would be foolish to let such an opportunity slip; it's a chance of a lifetime.

sentences.cn: 这样的机会我们不能错过.
sentences.en: We mustn't let slip such an opportunity.

sentences.cn: 我热爱乡村, 但我几乎没有机会见到它.
sentences.en: I love the country, but I have less opportunity of seeing it.

sentences.cn: 一天清晨机遇来了.
sentences.en: The opportunity came early one morning.

sentences.cn: 我趁此机会感谢你们.
sentences.en: I take this opportunity of thanking you.

sentences.cn: 顺便向各位报告一件事.
sentences.en: I take this opportunity to report to you about a matter.

sentences.cn: 以后，学生们可能会有机会选择他们喜欢的导师。

sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 但条件更优越的学生也不应该浪费这样的机会。
sentences.en: But more privileged students must not waste this opportunity either.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这将使黑人有机会在不受种族主义阻碍的条件下生活.
sentences.en: This would give black people the opportunity to live unhampered by racism.

sentences.cn: 现在我有机会去寻找最符合我条件和兴趣的工作了.
sentences.en: Now I have an opportunity to explore jobs that better suit my qualifications and interests.

sentences.cn: 博彩赔率–一个标有赔率的下注机会; 也是下注基本条件.
sentences.en: Betting line – a wager of any kind. Essentially, a betting opportunity.

sentences.cn: 我们现在如果条件利用得好, 外资数目可能更大一些.
sentences.en: If we can make good use of this opportunity, we may attract even more foreign capital.

sentences.cn: 必须让相关工会对雇佣条件进行监督评述.
sentences.en: The relevant union must be the opportunity to an opinion on the terms of employment.

sentences.cn: 企业在享受社会赋予的条件和机遇时,也应该以符合伦理 、 道德的行动回报社会 、 奉献社会.
sentences.en: Corporations, while enjoying opportunities and chances offered the society, should also back the society.

sentences.cn: 同时, 也为教师的成长提供了条件与空间.
sentences.en: Meanwhile, it provides conditions and opportunities for the improvement of teachers.

sentences.cn: 必需让相关工会对雇佣条件举办监视评述.
sentences.en: The relevant union must be given the opportunity to an opinion on the terms of employment.

sentences.cn: 虽然没有任何保障, 在中国市场经济的条件下, 还是有很多机遇去自主地创造财富的.
sentences.en: There is no security, but the opportunities, fortune and independence are great in China's market economy.

sentences.cn: 而且企业还要创造条件 、 把握时机实施品牌战略.
sentences.en: And enterprises will create the condition, seize the opportunity to implement brand strategy.

sentences.cn: 资本主义实行的机会公平原则, 又称条件公平或平等竞争.
sentences.en: The opportunity fairness principle that capitalism executes, call a condition fairness or equal competition again.

sentences.cn: 他们不会错过任何一个机会为孩子的未来发展创造最优越的条件.
sentences.en: They won't miss any opportunity to create the best conditions for their children's future development.

sentences.cn: 幸运是机会加条件的产物.
sentences.en: Luck is opportunity meeting readiness.

sentences.cn: 一个自己的羯磨与这些条件相适应的灵魂会为所提供的机会吸引.
sentences.en: A soul whose own karma approximates these conditions will be attracted by the opportunity presented.

sentences.cn: 我希望能亲自和你见面,更加详细地谈谈我的任职条件.
sentences.en: I'd welcome the opportunity to meet with yon in person to explain my credentials more fully.

And there was plenty of opportunity to do whatever you felt like doing.
